alert.note: Alert for Androscoggin; Cumberland (Maine) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 21 at 5:49PM EDT until July 21 at 6:15PM EDT by NWS Gray/Portland
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 615 PM EDT FOR SOUTHEASTERN ANDROSCOGGIN AND EAST CENTRAL CUMBERLAND COUNTIES... At 548 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Freeport, or 9 miles southwest of Brunswick, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Portland, Brunswick, Cumberland, Falmouth, Freeport, Gray, Yarmouth, Harpswell, Durham, Chebeague Island, Pownal, North Yarmouth and New Gloucester. This includes Interstate 295 between mile markers 10 and 25. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
